## Research Groups I'm Affiliated With

- **Valencia Bayesian Research Group (VABAR)**, based at the University of Valencia.

- **Statistical Modeling Ecology Group (SMEG)**, an interdisciplinary research group that brings together researchers from the Schools of Mathematics and Statistics, Biology, and Ecology.
